import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-profile', templateUrl: './profile.component.html', styleUrls: ['./profile.component.scss'] }) export class ProfileComponent { edit:boolean=false; bgColor:any = '#f0ad4e'; editProfile(){ this.edit = ! this.edit; if(!this.edit){ console.log("Updated"); // Write Profile Update Code Here }else{ console.log("Not"); this.bgColor = '#28a745'; this.bgColor = '#f0ad4e'; } } }
